com.azure.core.http.policy

Interface BeforeRetryPolicyProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HttpPolicyProvider

    public interface BeforeRetryPolicyProvider
extends HttpPolicyProvider
    Implementing classes are automatically added as policies before the retry policy.
